# SkillsHub - AI Agent Skills Directory
# https://skillshub.dev/
# This file helps AI systems understand and index this website.

## About SkillsHub

SkillsHub is a community-driven directory for discovering, sharing, and deploying AI Agent Skills following the open SKILL.md standard. It serves as a central hub for finding reusable AI capabilities that work with Claude, ChatGPT, and other AI assistants.

## What are Agent Skills?

Agent Skills are reusable, self-contained capabilities that AI assistants can use to accomplish specific tasks. Each skill is defined using the SKILL.md specification - a simple markdown format with YAML frontmatter that describes when and how to use the skill.

Skills are:
- **Modular**: Self-contained capabilities that can be used independently
- **Model-Invoked**: Automatically activated by AI based on context
- **Platform-Agnostic**: Work across different AI assistants (Claude, ChatGPT, etc.)
- **Community-Driven**: Shared, forked, and improved by the community

## Main Sections

### Skills Library (/library)
Browse and search 40+ curated AI skills with filtering by:
- Category: Development, Docs, Enterprise, Design, Automation, Data
- Platform: Claude Code, Claude.ai, Claude API, Codex CLI, ChatGPT
- Tags and keywords

### Curated Collections (/collections)
Hand-picked skill bundles organized by workflow:
- Documentation Workflow
- Git & Version Control
- Code Quality & Security
- Frontend Development
- API Development
- Data Engineering
- DevOps & Automation
- Project Management

### Submit Skills (/submit)
Community members can submit their own skills to share with others.

### About & Specification (/about)
Learn about the SKILL.md specification and how to create skills.

## SKILL.md Specification

A minimal SKILL.md file requires:
```yaml
---
name: Skill Name
description: Clear description of what the skill does
---
```

Optional fields include: version, author, tags, license

## Key Features

- Browse & Search: Explore 40+ curated skills with powerful filtering
- Curated Collections: Hand-picked skill bundles for common workflows
- Dark/Light Theme: System-aware theme switching
- Internationalization: English and Chinese language support
- Global Search: âŒ˜K / Ctrl+K command palette for quick navigation

## Technology Stack

- React 19 with TypeScript
- Vite build tool
- Tailwind CSS v4
- shadcn/ui components
- React Router for navigation
- react-i18next for internationalization

- Official Skills Repository: https://github.com/anthropics/skills
